testcase.classname: To Verify My Files Tabs Functionality
testcase.name: To verify download functionality of rejected document of DrySign
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to URL "https://drysign-qa.exela.global/#/"..................passed When enter the user name as "sid39@mailinator.com"..........................passed When enter the password as"Malin@555".......................................passed And user click on the sign in button........................................passed And user click on continue with free version................................passed And user click on My Files..................................................passed And user click on rejected tab..............................................passed And user click on View icon under Action column.............................passed And user get display document rejected......................................passed Then user click on Close icon...............................................passed When user click on Download icon............................................passed Then Document should get downloaded on Local storage as "TimoManual.pdf (1) (2).pdf".passed Then user click on plus icon................................................passed Then details get Display....................................................passed
